commands.name: red
commands.description: Creates a Vite Vanilla TypeScript project using PNPM.
commands.script: pnpm create vite {name} --template vanilla-ts; Set-Location {name} -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; pnpm install

commands.name: blue
commands.script: Write-Host 'Hello, {name}! This is blue command.' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host 'Hello, {name}! This is blue command.' -ForegroundColor Blue; Write-Host 'Hello, {name}! This is blue command.' -ForegroundColor DarkBlue
